function.description: This construct provides a convenient way to convert a date made by the Date plugin to the specific DATE ANSI SQL datatype.
function.longDescription:
To insert a date value into an RDBMS column of a DATE datatype, it is sometimes necessary to explicitly cast that value to DATE in order for the DB to correctly process the data.
This construct helps with that but it can only use dates made by the Date plugin.
